queen_1: Being a queen... it's a role filled with both joy and heartache. Every kit that's born, I feel an overwhelming surge of love and protectiveness. I watch them take their first breath, open their eyes, and explore the world.

Yet, with that love comes immense responsibility. I am not just nurturing the next generation of warriors, but the very future of our Clan. Their every scrape, every cry, keeps me awake at night. Have I done enough?
Am I teaching them the right lessons?

The nursery can sometimes feel like a bubble, separated from the rest of the Clan. But every whisper, every decision made by the leaders, affects us deeply. For one day, these kits will face those very challenges outside.

Seeing them grow, becoming apprentices, and then warriors, fills my heart with pride. But it's also tinged with fear. Will they remember what they learned in the nursery? Will the world be kind to them?
It's a life of countless emotions, challenges, and rewards. But when I see them succeed, when I see them find their place in the Clan, all the sleepless nights and worries fade away.
For I know, I've played a part in shaping the Clan's future, one kit at a time.
queen_2: Come here, little one. Your fur is so spiky!
Hey! Don't run away from me!
queen_3: My dear kit, being a queen is a role woven from strands of love, sacrifice, and hope. When I look at you, so tiny and curious, my heart swells with dreams and wishes for your future.

But there's more to being in the nursery than just cuddles and playtime. We queens tell stories, teach values, and instill courage. We prepare little ones like you for the big world outside, with its challenges and triumphs.

Some nights, when the moon is high and you're nestled close, I wonder what kind of warrior you'll become. Will you be fierce and brave, or wise and gentle? Maybe a mix of both, like the stars in the sky.
assertive_mentor11: Hey, y_c! One of the queens needs fresh moss, could you grab it for her?
Thanks, bud. Knew I could count on you. *Wink*
assertive_mentor12: y_c, no matter what happens, promise me you'll never let anyone make you feel bad about your choice to become a queen.
What we do here is just as essential as hunting or fighting for the clan, if not even more so. The kits are the clan's future, after all!
It's a serious job, and I expect you to take it seriously.
Even if it does entail playing the odd game of pretend with kits from time to time ... hehe.
assertive_mentor92: Surprise assessment, y_c! What's the first thing you should do when a queen goes into labor?
... What? That's not ... even remotely close.
*Sigh*. I was just doing this as a joke, but I guess I really have to show you again now ...
assertive_mentor93: Surprise assessment, y_c! What's the first thing you should do when a queen goes into labor?
I was just doing this as a joke, but turns out you're a lot smarter than you let on! Nice work, y_c.
assertive_mentor4: I noticed you helping r_k and r_k resolve their dispute the other day, and it really wasn't bad! You've come a long way. But, one thing I did notice was that you were a little too ... nice?
Not that you shouldn't be kind when trying to help the kits. That's not what I mean. But you shouldn't be too afraid to say what you really mean, either.
We're queens. It's our job to be honest with the kits, and instill in them the values that will guide them for the rest of their lives! Not protect their feelings.
Sometimes the kits will be unhappy with us, and that's just fine, so long as they're safe and healthy. You can't let anyone's opinion of you stop you from doing what's best.
Now, c'mon! I'll show you how a real pro does it.
assertive_mentor3: Something I've noticed about you, y_c, is that you think too much.

That's not exactly a bad thing, plenty of apprentices are hesitant, but when one of the kits needs your help, there's no time for thinking. You just have to see the problem in front of you, and go for it!
Then again, I can't even remember how many times I've been chewed out by the deputy for acting too rashly ...
I guess it's all about balance. You can't doubt yourself too much, but you can't be blinded by confidence, either.
It's a tough thing to master, but I know you can do it!
assertive_mentor: Hey, y_c! Ready to start the day? I was thinking we could ditch the training grounds today and, instead, practice more real-world applied stuff.
Ah, don't look so worried. We don't have to do everything totally by the rules all the time! Sometimes, it's better to go off the beaten path.
I'll meet you by the camp entrance, m'kay?
assertive_mentor1: What's going on, y_c? ... Hey, don't give me that nasty look! I can see you, you know!
For an apprentice, you sure have a lot of attitude. I get you've got spirit, but if this is gonna work out, the two of us have to work together.
So drop it. And I'd better not catch you looking at me like that again!
assertive_mentor2: Alright, y_c! You're totally mastering that skill I taught you the other day ... you're improving so fast, pretty soon, you're gonna be outperforming me! Haha!
I have nothing to say, except for, I guess ... I'm proud of you.
You're turning into a fine member of c_nClan already.
assertive_jealous1: What did I do in a past life to wind up related to you, y_c?
assertive_parent4: What do you want? Do you need something?
... You just want to talk? Why?
Do we still even count as family anymore?
assertive_parent4_2: Ugh, StarClan, would you leave me alone?
Seriously, I don't know any other parent who bothers their grown kit this much!
assertive_parent4_3: Sorry, y_c! No time to talk right now, I just got a task from d_n.
I'll be sure to catch up with you some other time, though!
assertivewarrior_mediatorapp1: [Seeing the bold, daring, fierce cat that t_c has grown into fills your heart with pride.]
[Could they really have been your kit in the nursery a few moons ago?]
assertive_parent4_4: Hehe, quit trying to fix my fur, y_c!
I'm not a kit anymore, I know how to do it myself!
assertive_medapp2: Hey, y_c ... do you ever get lonely sleeping here in the medicine den all by yourself? I know I would ...
Tell you what, if you ever get scared or cold in the night, just come over to my den. You can sleep in my nest, with me. Okay?
assertive_4: Whoa! Watch where you're going there, little pal! One wrong move, and you might get stepped on!
Ah, quit that, you don't need to apologize. Just be a bit more careful from now on, is all.
Or else, when you get bigger, it'll really become a problem. Hehe!
assertive_tonewborn: Whoa! Hey there, little guy! Shouldn't you be in the nursery?
Hehe. You've got an adventurous spirit. I like that about you.
But for now, you gotta stay where it's safe! C'mon. Let's go back to your parents.
assertive_tonewborn1: Aw ... little guy hasn't even gotten their eyes open yet!
They're gonna be a killer, though. I can already tell. See those little paws? This kit's got fight in 'em!
assertive_tonewborn3: Whoa ... this is them? They're so small!
Hard to believe I was that small once ...
assertive_apprentice7: y_c. Buddy. Best friend. We've GOTTA TRY this. r_c told me that if you eat three mice, one rabbit, and howl at the moon you get magic powers!
What? It's totally real, they wouldn't lie to me like that! I prommissseee.
introspective_queen_to_NB: [You felt the top of your head be touched by t_c's nose.]
I hope you rested well. I wanted to check up on you, you're the last kit to wake up. Though that's unsurprising. You've got lots of growing to do, little one.
introspective_queen: No, I'm okay. I'm just out of the nursery, I needed to stretch my legs. I'm not currently needed, and I need to get out sometimes!
Sometimes you just need to get out, take a break from normality, you know? It'll give you appreciation for how your life currently is, without allowing you to become stagnant.
You never want to become too stuck in your own ways, being able to adapt is one of the best skills of being a clan cat.
introspective_queen_1: y_c, Afternoon. How are you doing today?
I've been okay. Actually, you know, this has been on my mind recently.
Do you see having kits in your future? I understand this is a private question, so I'm not expecting an answer, but...
If you do, you'll be well looked after. I can promise you that. My job is to look after the parents, just as much as the kits. Especially if they're new parents.
You wouldn't need to worry about a thing, I'm always here for you, no matter what.
introspective_queen_2: y_c. It's nice to see you today, thank you for stopping by.
Hm. I've been thinking about the role I've chosen, being a queen.
The role of a permanent queen is fairly recent, clan history speaking. Especially in comparison to roles like the medicine cat. And some were less...
Compassionate towards the role we perform, despite its importance.
They viewed us as wasting clan resources, and nothing but baby makers. But we are so much more than that. We help in ways medicine cats cannot.
We're formally trained to recognise signs of illness in kits and Queens, and to provide comfort in stressful situations.
I believe our constant presence with the kits helps us to realise something's wrong and get help before... the worst happens.
Just make sure to know that no matter what, everyone has their role to play. Don't be a cat who believes they're more important than those whose role is less flashy.
introspective_queen_3: y_c? Is everything okay? You look a little... down.
I know, I'm not a mediator, it's not necessarily my job to poke my nose in and bother people about problems.
But sometimes I feel talking to them can be a little... much. You know? It's very formal. Sometimes you may just want to talk to some with less... procedures?
I know I'm a queen, but I do love and care for everyone in this clan, not just the kits.
Listen, if you need an ear, or some advice, or even just a shoulder to cry on, let me know. We can even go out of camp to talk, if you'd prefer privacy.
Just... don't suffer in silence, y_c. Some Cats are really thinking of you, and love you a whole lot.
introspective_queen_4: Hello, y_c. Lovely to see you. Is something the matter?
... Yes, I understand that. Everyone needs a break every now and then. Wearing your paws and mind out with all that running isn't good for you.
How about you take a break here? There's plenty of space, and I'm sure the kits will enjoy being able to talk to someone else!
I'd like to think I'm good at telling stories, but I think they like hearing from cats with more... experience. You know what I mean?
So what do you say? Want to be a storyteller for a day?
introspective_queen_5: [t_c was sitting staring up at the sky in deep thought. You looked up to see what they were staring at, when an hawk swooped over the camp.]
Leave! You cannot have any of the kits!
[You walk over to make sure all the kits are okay.]
y_c, hello. Yes, we're all absolutely fine. I saw it coming, it's far worse at hunting than any of us are. Even me.
Yeah, I need to be very vigilant, if not, they'll swoop in and steal a kit, and I refuse to let them hurt anyone.
Hawks may be very beautiful to watch, but they're no joke when it comes to kit safety, y_c.
assertive_1: Ugh. Can you believe how cruel some cats are, y_c? A bunch of apprentices were trying to convince these two kits to sneak into a badger den ... what a bunch of mouse-brains.
No matter what, don't let anyone try to pressure you into doing something you don't think is right. Go with your gut, and stick to your own values. That's what's really important.
assertive_6: *Sigh*. Hey, y_c. Come to ruin the fun again?
Whatever. I'm going to go do something actually exciting. Don't wait up.
assertive_queensapp: You want me to stop roughhousing with the kits?
Psh, c'mon, y_c, loosen up! You worry too much!
These are the fearsome future warriors of c_nClan. They can withstand a little -
[One of the kits smacks facefirst into the nursery wall and starts crying.]
... Okay, that's the first time that's happened.
assertive_queensapp_2: Hey! I'll race ya to the other side of the nursery!
[You and t_c line up at the wall, and at the signal, you break into a full sprint! t_c gets a head start and you're worried you won't make it ... Until, miraculously, you start gaining on them!]
Hehe, you'll be a great warrior yet!
assertive_queensapp_3: r_w was in here earlier asking about kits ... I didn't know what to tell them. Sorta weird that they were asking, no?
What do you think it means?
Ooh! Maybe they're in a forbidden relationship! A star-crossed love that can never be, with a rugged yet good-looking rogue who would do anything to protect them!
*Sigh* ... Sorry, what was I talking about?
assertive_warrior_or_elder: After r_k walked in here with that live beetle, I genuinely thought I would lose it.
Without you here, y_c, I genuinely don't know what I would've done ... Died, probably. Like, actually died.
assertive_elder: Could you get some more moss for the corner nest? It's needed to be changed for, like, forever.
assertive_elder_2: [Watching t_c play with the kits is like watching the most skilled hunter bring down a piece of prey, or watching the medicine cat heal a wound.]
[Never once did you ever think anyone could make the act of playing look so skilled and graceful ... but t_c somehow does everything perfectly.]
assertive_elder_3: Queens just went out for some fresh air ... which means, any moment now, we should hear -
[One of the kits starts wailing for their mother. Loudly.]
assertive_elder_4: r_a's so big now ... StarClan, seems like just yesterday they were the size of my little paw.
Ain't it weird, watching generation after generation of kits grow up and make their lives?
No matter what, I'll always remember them as the kits we used to play with ... even if they end up being our bosses someday!
assertive_elder_5: y_c, what are you still doing in the nursery? It's time for your healing lesson!
You didn't think this job was just gonna be playing with kits all day, did you?
Maybe you can still make it to the medicine den if you hurry!
assertive_app29: Tch. Did you see what a snake-heart r_c was acting like earlier? And over a piece of prey, no less!
Cat's so mouse-brained, probably can't even tell their own tail from a willow branch ...
... Whoa, what? Wait, you want me to apologize to them?
But they were in the wrong, not me! Why even entertain their behavior with an apology?
If they're mad, who cares! Let 'em stay mad! They can stay mad forever, for all I care!
Look, I know you're the mediator, and it's your job to resolve conflicts, or whatever, but ... you love me. Shouldn't you be on my side?
You'd really choose them over me?
assertive_app29_2: Let me guess. You've come to patch things up between me and r_c, 'cause of the fight we had earlier. That right?
I'll save you a few words - it's not gonna happen. Why's it always me that's gotta be in the wrong, huh? Why not force them to apologize?
Go find somebody else's problem to fix.
assertive_queensapp_4: What's the matter, kid? You hungry? Need somebody to take you to the dirtplace?
Well? Spit it out, we ain't got all day!
assertive_queensapp_5: y_c! I found something I think you're really gonna love!
[t_c drops a perfectly smooth, shiny pebble at your paws.]
Pretty, huh? Plus, it's perfect to play with! No sharp corners, see, so you can't get hurt.
Come find me later, and maybe we can play a game with it!
assertive_queensapp1: [As you watch t_c move around the nursery, it's easy to tell why they chose to become a queen.]
[They have so much energy, it's almost like they're still a kit themself!]
assertive_queensapp2: Hey, y_c! Wanna play a game? Let's do 'Leader of StoneClan!'
... What? Never heard of it?! Unbelievable! We used to play it all the time when I was young!
Kits these days, *tsk* so uneducated. Luckily, you have me to teach you!
Okay, so here's how it works ...
[t_c explains the game to you, eyes flashing with excitement. As you play together, it almost seems like they're enjoying it more than you are!]
assertive_queensapp3: Hey, guess what time it is?
Do you REALLY, REALLY, REALLY wanna know?!
... It's time to take the herbs the medicine cat gave you for your tummy! Yaaaayyy!
[Grinning, t_c pushes the herbs towards you, and you find yourself feeling a little tricked.]
assertive_queensapp4: [t_c is currently being used as a climbing rock by all the kits in the nursery.]
Oh, hey, y_c! How's it - ACK! Hey, not the eyes, not the eyes!
[You ask if you should maybe come back another time?]
Oh, nah. This is nothing! Just wait until the hunting patrol gets back - that's when it gets really crazy around here!
So, is there something you need?
assertive_queensapp4_2: Shh - Not too loud! The kits are sleeping.
Getting them down was such a nightmare ... Oh, but they're so cute, though.
Seeing them all curled up together like that ... All the headaches and pain suddenly seem worth it, don'tcha think?
assertive_queensapp5: Alright, alright, settle down! Time for a nap everybody, playtime's over!
That means you, too, y_c, no exceptions. You don't want Quietkit to get you, do you?
Who's Quietkit? Well, it's an interesting story ...

Once upon a time, there was a young kit named Quietkit who always stayed up past her bedtime. She was so tired that, one day, she fell asleep on her paws, and fell into a hole so deep, it went straight into the Dark Forest!
Now, her spirit haunts the nursery, waiting for more disobedient kits she can take down with her ...
Now, do you wanna be Quietkit's next playmate? Or do you wanna put the moss-ball down and get in your nest?
assertive_elder_6: Hey, furbag. I brought you something!
[t_c lays a colorful feather at your paws.
I know this is your favorite color, and you miss exploring the territory. So I knew I just had to bring it to you.
Yeah, yeah, don't get all soft on me, hehe. Wanna grab a meal together?
assertivewarrior_leader5: y_c, I think I'm ready for an apprentice.
I'm qualified, I'm a good teacher, and I'd love a younger cat who I could show the ropes to!
I know it's not for me to say, but I just figured I'd put a good word in.
Do keep in mind, will ya?
assertivewarrior_leader3: Hey, boss! Come down to mingle with us common folk? Hehe.
Everything's going just fine around camp, as far as I can tell. There's a leak in the warrior's den that someone should probably get on ... wanna lend a paw?
... Really? Okay! I'll go grab the brambles!
assertivewarrior_deputy2: Yeah, right. Like I have to take orders from you!
You may think you're a warrior, but all you do is sit on your haunches and boss everyone around all day. That's no warrior. That's a coward.
Go find some other cat to impose on.
assertive_mediator3: Hmph. You may fight for peace, y_c, but I know it by another word - cowardice.

I know compromise has its place, but you'd say you'd really forsake your values - the values of this clan - just so all of us can just laze around on our haunches and never have to risk anything real?
I don't think so. I fight for what I believe in. No matter what it costs.
Maybe think about that the next time you try to make a compromise with the enemy.
assertivewarrior_mediatorapp: Man, you're insightful for an apprentice, y_c!
When I was your age, all I thought about was smashing stuff and chasing after my crushes. But now, here you are! Sorting out problems with cats who've been around ten times longer than you!
That must take a lot of discipline. The whole clan is proud of you!
assertivewarrior_mediatorapp_2: Oh, absolutely not. No way a little apprentice is going to tell me what's right and what's wrong.
Could you at least get your mentor over here, or something? Needing a so-called 'mediator' is already humiliating enough as it is.
Let alone when they're barely out of the nursery.
assertive_mediatorapp: Is it really true that you're allowed to just ... travel between the clans as you please?
Whoa! That's so cool!!! I've always wanted to explore the other territories, but I've never been allowed.
Is it true that o_c cats can swim like fish? Or that their territory is full of snakes?
[You and r_c have a long conversation about the other clans. With each detail you share, their eyes grow bigger and bigger.]
assertive_medapp: How's it going, mini-medicine cat? Herbal life treating you well?
Don't worry, I'm not going to run headfirst into trouble and injure myself today.
assertive_warrior_or_elder_2: Not always easy in the apprentice's den, huh? I remember those days. Sometimes cats can be so cliquey, especially the young ones ...
But, no matter what, you can never let fear hold you back from being who you are! Work hard, be friendly, and forget anyone who tries to get you down!
That's real bravery. Not just rushing into battle, but also standing up for what you believe in. And bravery is what makes a warrior who they are.
Heh, look at me, getting all wise ... Just my opinion, is all.
assertive_warrior_or_elder_2_2: Working hard, y_c? Or, is it more like hardly working? Hehe.
Y'know, it's good to contribute to the clan, but make sure you take some time to grow up, too. Working isn't everything. Now's the time for you to get out and explore!
*Sigh* I sorta miss those days myself ...
assertive_warrior_or_elder_3: StarClan, y_c, look at you ... could you really have been one of my kits here in the nursery just a few moons ago?
But, ah, no one can stay a kit forever, I suppose. And it's been such a joy, watching you grow.
You're always welcome here any time you need!
assertive_like: Hey, flea-brain! I've been eyeing this huge thrush on the freshkill pile all day - wanna share it?
What the - the thrush is totally missing! But I was saving it for us!
That's it! I will not rest until the cat who did this is hunted down ... AND BROUGHT TO JUSTICE!!!
[You and t_c dissolve into a fit of giggles.]
assertive_dislike: Hey y_c. Why don't you jump off a cliff? It's a new thing every cat in the Clan is trying.
assertive_dislike1: Sorry, is someone talking to me right now?
assertive_dislike1_2: Can't you see I'm busy, mousebrain? Go bother someone else!
assertive_dislike1_4: Hey, y_c. You're looking smaller than usual. Maybe it's time to catch up on your training.
assertive_rom: Hey, y_c! I just got a new scar today! Wanna come take a look?
Yeah, I ran into a little dog out at the edge of a territory. Wasn't too hard to chase off, but it gave me a little nick. Medicine cat says it's probably never going away.
[You brush your tail over t_c's scar, and they seem a little too thrilled by the gesture for it to just be friendly.]
assertive_rom1: StarClan, y_c, it's ... it's like you don't even know how beautiful you are.
... Augh. Look what you've done! Now I'm getting all sappy!
Just don't let it get to your head, furbag. I'm hot stuff, too.
[t_c winks at you, and you laugh together.]
assertive_rom2: Hey, y_c! I just finished visiting the kits in the nursery. StarClan, they're cute!
I wouldn't mind being a parent ... having a few mini-me's running around, terrorizing the clan.
How about you? Do you ever see yourself having kits someday? Not in, like, a weird way, of course! Just curious, hehe.
assertive_rom3: Hey, y_c, what are your thoughts on feathers as a nesting material?
Why? Psh, don't play coy! We're basically sharing a nest at this point, with how often you sneak into mine. Haha!
Tell you what ... how about we ditch the formalities altogether and just make one, giant, super-nest!
Better start gathering moss! I know it's your favorite.
assertivewarriorapp_comfort: Just ... had a bad day, is all ...
*Sigh* y_c, have you ever felt like you're not enough for anyone?
Usually, when it comes to making a decision, I never hesitate. Whatever the obstacle, I'll run headfirst into it, no questions asked.
But, today, in the nursery, I was playing with one of the kits, and they accidentally got hurt ...
I just feel like such a failure. A liability. I can't help the way I am, but what if everyone's better off without me?
[You offer t_c words of reassurance, but they seem troubled beyond comforting.]
[Still, you sit with them through the night, hoping to stabilize them through whatever storm they might be weathering right now.]
assertive_comfort: [t_c shakes you from your sleep in the night.]
Sorry to wake you ... this will sound really embarrassing, but I, uh ... had a nightmare. Heh.
[You and t_c curl up together in your nest. Their pelt is warm, but their body is still trembling a little.]
... Can I tell you about my nightmare?
In my nightmare, you were drowning. You were screaming for help, and I kept trying to swim out to save you, but you just kept getting further and further away.
Imagine that. I've faced rogues and dogs and foxes and monsters, but out of everything, the thing that scares me the most is ...
[You both eventually drift off to sleep, and it takes a long time for anyone to rouse you in the morning.]
assertive_comfort_2: Hey, y_c? Have you ever thought about, uh ...
What if something happens to you? Or something happens to me? Or something happens to the clan, and we're both demolished in a fiery pit of nothingness!
Phew ... sorry, I know I'm not usually so grim. But I guess I'm just really worried.
What if something goes wrong, and I'm not there to protect you?
I won't let that happen ... I just won't!
assertive_rom4: What's that? One of the kits told you your ears are too big?
What a load of fox-dung! Those kits don't have functioning brains. Besides, I like your ears! I think it's cute, how big they are!
Er ... not cute in that way, mind you. Just, y'know ... ahem ...
[The blush on r_c's cheeks confirms that, yes, they did mean it in that way. And they're doing a terrible job of hiding it.]
assertive_elder_7: *Sigh* Can't you see I have more important things to do, y_c?
Go back to catching mice, or whatever.
assertive_warrior_or_elder_4: Working hard, y_c? Or, is it more like hardly working? Hehe.
Y'know, it's good to contribute to the clan, but make sure you take some time to grow up, too. Working isn't everything. Now's the time for you to get out and explore!
*Sigh* I sorta miss those days myself ...
